title: Sylas's Ult
body: Hi. I just got done playing a game of Sylas and as I was trying to ult a few champions, like Nocturne and Garen, it would tell me "Champion not ready." no matter how much I spammed the R on one of them. How does Sylas's ult work and when can I use and not use his ult? Thanks!

replies.body:
Sylas' ult has two cooldowns; one for himself, and one tracked separately for each enemy champion whenever he steals their ult. There should be a dark-blue indicator on the ground around them that tells you that they're still on cooldown. 

Just remember that you will generally can't steal the same person's ult multiple times in a row. If your ult is ready and you can't steal your lane opponent's ult, look to shove and roam so you can take someone else's and make a play there.
Okay, thank you so much for that explanation.
Can't steal a players ult after you've stolen it for 2x their CD for that ult, or something like that.

Did you read the tooltip for the ability you were trying to use?
